product_overview: InteliFeed Hub is a modern, scalable, multi-tenant feedback and analytics platform designed to empower restaurant businesses with advanced feedback collection, analytics, campaign management, and gamification capabilities. It integrates state-of-the-art technologies and a mobile-first design approach to deliver a seamless user experience across devices.
core_goals: Provide a complete feedback management system including surveys, NPS engine, and trend analytics to help restaurants understand customer sentiment.
Enable multi-tenant and restaurant-specific management to support diverse business needs under a unified platform.
Deliver robust analytics dashboards with customizable charts, AI-powered insights, and reporting for data-driven decision making.
Offer comprehensive campaign creation and communication tools to engage customers effectively.
Incorporate gamification features to enhance user engagement through events and rewards.
Support seamless authentication, user profile management, and role-based access control.
Ensure high performance with PWA capabilities, offline support, and mobile-first UI components.
Implement a flexible billing system for subscription and pricing plan management.
Integrate third-party services and native device capabilities to extend platform functionality.
Maintain accessibility and internationalization to serve diverse user groups.
key_features: Authentication System with login, signup, password recovery, and secure user profile management.
Multi-tenant architecture allowing tenant and restaurant selection with context management.
Feedback Management System including NPS engine, survey builder, feedback collection forms, and detailed insights tabs.
Advanced Analytics Dashboards offering general, restaurant-specific, AI-powered insights and exportable reports.
Campaign Management tools for building, managing, and communicating campaigns.
Gamification System featuring events management, rewards distribution, and user engagement tracking.
QR Code Generation and Management for streamlined feedback collection at restaurant locations.
Billing System handling pricing plans, subscriptions, and payment integrations with Stripe.
Accessibility features with configurable settings to support users with disabilities.
Mobile-first UI Component library optimized for responsive and touch-based interaction.
Performance enhancements via PWA, lazy loading, virtualization of large lists, and offline synchronization.
Comprehensive Notification System using toast messages for instant user feedback.
Routing system with protected and public routes ensuring secure and smooth navigation.
Custom React hooks to facilitate reusable logic and native device capability integration.
Third-party integration manager to connect and handle external services.
State management with React Query and Zustand for server and client states respectively.
user_flow_summary: User signs up or logs in via the authentication system; password recovery is available if needed.
User selects tenant and restaurant context to work within the correct scope.
User accesses the feedback management interface to create surveys, view NPS scores, analyze trends, and review customer feedback.
User navigates to the analytics dashboard to view visual charts, AI insights, or generate/export detailed reports.
User creates and manages marketing or engagement campaigns and communicates via integrated tools.
User engages with gamification features like events and rewards to increase interaction and retention.
Restaurant managers generate and share QR codes to facilitate easy customer feedback collection.
User accesses billing page to view pricing plans, manage subscriptions, and handle payments securely.
User customizes accessibility settings to enhance usability for their needs.
User receives and manages notifications via toast messages throughout the application for real-time feedback.
All navigation is facilitated by a robust routing system with role-based and protected route guards.
Application ensures smooth performance on mobile and PWA environments with offline support and device capability integration.
validation_criteria: All authentication flows including signup, login, password recovery, and profile updates must function securely with proper validation and error handling.
Multi-tenant and restaurant selection contexts must correctly switch views and data without leaks between tenants.
Feedback system must support creating, submitting, and analyzing surveys with accurate NPS calculations and trend visualizations.
Analytics dashboards should display accurate and responsive charts; AI insights must provide relevant suggestions; report exports generate correct data files.
Campaign management tools must allow creation, editing, deletion, and communication dispatch without errors.
Gamification features should track events and rewards accurately with real-time updates.
QR codes generated should be scannable and properly linked to feedback forms specific to the selected restaurant.
Billing system must process pricing plans and subscriptions securely with integration to Stripe and reflect correct billing status.
Accessibility settings must apply across the app and pass automated and manual accessibility audits.
UI must be fully responsive and optimized for mobile devices with smooth PWA installation and offline functionality.
Notification system must provide timely and contextually accurate messages without blocking critical interactions.
Routing system should protect restricted pages and handle navigation errors gracefully.
Custom hooks must be unit tested with Vitest and integration tested where applicable.
All third-party integrations must be monitored for failures and handle edge cases gracefully with fallbacks.
Performance benchmarks including load times, responsiveness, and caching strategies must meet defined SLAs.
